title: Sudden green flickering screen and phone unusable (5 month old Pixel 4a)
content:
Girlfriend's Pixel 4a suddenly went to black screen and wouldn't light up, but it was working. No drops, no water, in a case, etc.

Did a soft reset and screen went to green. Still readable, but touchscreen went crazy, so couldn't enter password.

Soft reset again. Now screen flickers green repeatedly for a small fraction of a second.

Thoughts?
